attributes.action: keep the liecence fee within the BBC rather than sharing it with commercial broadcasting stations.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The government has plans to force the BBC to share a portion of the licence fee revenue with commercial organisations (eg. ITV).
Commercial broadcasting has the ability to generate large amounts of income through the use of advertising, while the BBC subsists entirely on the licence fee income.
This fee should only be awarded to other commercial parties under the ruling that they reduce the amount of advertising accordingly.
